Title: Sports policy will be ready by October 15: Madhwaraj
Content: Pramod Madhwaraj, Minister of State for Fisheries, Youth Empowerment and Sports, said on Wednesday that a sports policy for the State would be ready by October 15. Addressing presspersons after holdi
